title: Issue a Commercial Insurance Policy
description: An underwriter has approved an application for a small business owner's policy (BOP) and needs to issue it.

tasks.description: Retrieve the approved application and final quote.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter has the final, approved terms for the policy.

tasks.description: Bind coverage, making the policy officially active.
tasks.expected_outcome: The underwriter successfully binds the policy.

tasks.description: Generate the complete policy document package and send it to the new policyholder.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates and sends the full policy packet to the customer.
